results.name: a(n) = A060502(n) + A275851(n).
comment: These are averages (number of balls) in siteswap-patterns constructed like in A060498, but with 0's replaced by the length of the pattern.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..40320
Index entries for sequences related to factorial base representation
